ml:Announcement.ml:title: MarkLogic Sponsors XML Summer School at St. Edmund Hall, Oxford University, September 5-10
ml:Announcement.ml:author: Eric Bloch

ml:body.ml:teaser: MarkLogic is a proud sponsor of the 2010 edition of the XML Summer School, held again at St. Edmund Hall, Oxford University. The school runs September 5 - 10.
ml:body.p: Delegates on the full XML Summer School package, the 3-day or 2-day courses, should make sure to join us for the Monday (6 September) evening punting on the River Cherwell. (Those of you thinking this has something to do with kicking a football without letting it drop, should probably pay closer attention to the word, "river" in the previous sentence.)

This evening event should be a splendid time to network outside the lecture room and get to know school faculty like MarkLogic's Norm Walsh (who'll be teaching the teaching in the XSLT and XQuery and Web Services and Identity courses) and other students.
